short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Makes infinitecraft a walk in the park, a peice of cake, create your own items with a click of a button!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Infinitez enables you to add as many items to your game as your computer can handle, with easy customization for each item's appearance and feel. You have the freedom to assign any emoji to an item, making it truly your own. This feature not only allows for personalization but also encourages exploration. You can experiment with how different items interact, discover new combinations, and even create unique items that no one else has. Infinitez is designed to make your gaming experience more engaging and personalized, offering endless possibilities for creativity and discovery.
